Tucson nodds to Perceptor to acknlowedge his request.

"Of course, when eve=
r you're ready, I'll be more than happy to converse with you."

He then tur=
ns his attention to Rodimus.  What was he feeling?  What was his spark tell=
ing him? After thinking for a moment, it comes to him quickly.  A stern loo=
k comes upon his face plate.  One that stands more determined than ever to =
put a foot down and turn the tables once and for all, in the favor of the i=
nnocent and the oppressed.

" The Decepticons and the Predacons have had th=
e upper hand far too long.  And now, we have trouble comming from the Unicr=
onians as well.  This planet, everything and everyone who has been innocent=
ly caught in our cross fire, deserves to have their world back the way it w=
as before it became corrupted by Hydras, Cyclonus and the Unicronians.  Too=
 much wrong has been committed, and I feel it's time something substantial =
was done about it."

He pauses for a moment.

" My spark is telling me that=
 there is a fight ahead of us.  One we can NOT afford to lose.  And in orde=
r to win this fight, it will take more than just a hand full of good warrio=
rs to win it.  Rodimus, I feel it's time our Autobot Companions had a chanc=
e to have their voices heard once again, and show the Decepticons, and Pred=
acons that we are by no means defeated permanently.  But to have their voic=
es heard, they must be awakened."

With his words, the light inside his che=
st, begins to pulsate once more.  This time quite a bit brighter than the l=
ast time it pulsated. By some strange instinct, it points him in the direct=
ion of where the Autobots were sleeping.  Slowly he makes his way toward th=
em.

"Of course, Rodimus, you were right to question me. I feel it, what ne=
eds to be done.. The answers are within me, it was just a matter of finding=
 them. "

He kneels next to the body of Optimus Prime, as a strong desire t=
o do so, compells him to place a hand upon his chest, where his Matrix lays=
 dorment.  He did not know what to expect but something was telling him to =
do exactly what he was doing.

"I - think I may have something that belongs=
 to you."
